title: Sign In Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Login from the heading
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to the Sign-In page: https://www.sny.tv/sign-in

title: Sign In Page - Valid Credentials
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has valid credentials
AND the user has loaded the Sign In page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has entered valid credentials
AND the user selects "Login"
custom_expected:
THEN the sign-in will be successful
AND the user will be redirected back to the homepage
AND the Nav will then Say Log Out | Profile in the top-right corner
![](index.php?/attachments/get/2391)

title: Sign In Page - Invalid Credentials
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user does not have valid credentials
AND the user has loaded the Sign In page
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters invalid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the user is given the following validation messages

Only username is entered on Submit: Please enter a password AND We found some errors. Please review the form and make corrections
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24092)


Only password is entered upon submission: Please enter a username AND We found some errors. Please review the form and make corrections
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24093)




Incorrect credentials with both fields filled in (wrong email or wrong password): Authentication Error. Please check email and/or password and try again.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24091)

title: Forgot Password - Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Sign-In page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Forgot your password?"
custom_expected:
Then the user will be redirected to the Forgot Password page: https://www.sny.tv/forgot-password
![](index.php?/attachments/get/2395)

title: Forgot Password - Invalid Email
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to https://beta.sny.tv/forgot-password
custom_steps: WHEN the user has entered an invalid email address on https://beta.sny.tv/forgot-password
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the following message in Red
"Please enter a valid email"
AND the email input field should be highlighted in red
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24090)

title: Forgot Password - Success
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on https://www.sny.tv/forgot-password
custom_steps:
AND the user has entered an email in the correct syntax (name@domain.com)
AND the user hits Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to https://www.sny.tv/success
AND the user will be notified via email their new password for the site
AND the user will be able to sign in with the new password the next time they go to https://www.sny.tv/sign-in
*Note* Forgot Password does not check the DB to see if the email address exists in our system. Will bring the user to the success page regardless.
*Note* If you remember your old password it will still work until you enter the new one.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/2397)

title: Registration Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Register from the heading
custom_expected:
Then the user will be redirected to the following page: https://sny.tv/registration
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24088)

title: Registration Page - Failed Registration with Invalid First Name

GIVEN the user is not signed in
AND the user has navigated to the Registration page
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters ever possible invalid First Name, while passing valid data into all the other fields
custom_expected:
THEN the error message: "Please provide your first name."
AND the first name input field will be highlighted in red

title: Registration Page - Failed Registration with Invalid Last Name

AND the user has navigated to the Registration page
custom_steps: WHEN the users passes in every possible piece of invalid data for Last Name, while all other fields receive valid data
custom_expected:
THEN the following alert "Please provide your last name!." should appear
AND the last name input field should be highlighted in red

title: Registration Page - Failed Registration with Invalid Email

custom_expected:

custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to a success page that reads "Welcome to SNY!": https://www.sny.tv/welcome

title: Registration Page-Failed Registration with Duplicate Email

title: Homepage - Hide Heading

custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the page
custom_expected:
THEN the heading should be auto-hid from the page

custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the page
custom_expected:
THEN the Main heading will disappear AND the team navigation will still be visible but will shift in place of the Main Heading
AND scrolling back up the page will shift the Main Heading and team navigation back in place

title: Videos Landing Page

GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
AND the user has opened the Menu button in the heading
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects VIDEO from the heading dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be directed to the most recent video from the "SNY Video" playlist

https://www.sny.tv/video/1216195783/geico-sportsnite-giants-hopes

title: Play
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage or another section with video content
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the play button on the video section
custom_expected:
THEN the video image will be replaced by the video player
AND then the video will begin to play from the beginning

title: Pause/Play
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is already playing a video
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Pause from the video player buttons
custom_expected: THEN the video will be paused

title: Volume Change
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is already playing a video on the site
custom_steps: WHEN the user drags the Volume switch in the video player
custom_expected: THEN the volume should adjust accordingly

title: Mute
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is already playing a video on the site
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Volume Icon from the video player buttons
custom_expected: THEN the video will be muted and the user will no longer hear any sound

title: Fullscreen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is already playing a video
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Fullscreen button from the right corner of the video player
custom_expected: THEN the video will open in fullscreen on the user's device/browser.

title: Escape Fullscreen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is already playing a video
AND the video is already in fullscreen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hits the Escape button on their keyboard
OR WHEN the user clicks the Fullscreen icon in the right side of the video player
custom_expected: THEN the video will exit fullscreen and will continue playback

title: VPP - Autoplay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
AND the user has selected VIDEOS from the Main Dropdown menu
custom_steps: WHEN the VIDEOS page has completed loading
custom_expected: THEN the Video Player will show up and the first video in the playlist will AutoPlay

title: VTP - Autoplay
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a video page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks a link that goes to a Video Topic Page
Ex: https://www.sny.tv/video/topic/151163584/
custom_expected:
THEN the playlist should start to Autoplay on page load
AND the user should see the corresponding Topic listed under the player

title: Homepage - 300x250 in 9th Latest News Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
AND the user has added ?adtest=flatads to the homepage URL if ads are not initially visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Latest News sections
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a 300x250 Ad Space occupying the 9th tile of the Latest news sections (there are three total)

title: Homepage - Taboola 1x4 Under Latest News
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
AND the user has added ?adtest=flatads to the homepage URL if ads are not initially visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down below the Latest News Sections
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 4 square 250.984x209.141 Ad spaces directly underneath the last row of each Latest News tiles (There are 3 total)

title: Homepage - 728x90 Under Taboola
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded the homepage
AND the user has added ?adtest=flatads to the homepage URL if ads are not initially visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls below the Taboola ads
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a 728x90 ad space under each Taboola Ad (There are 3 total)

title: Team News - 300x250 Every 4 Article Links
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded a team page
AND the user has removed everything from the url except the team and news
-EX: https://sny.tv/mets/news
AND the user has added ?adtest=flatads to the end of the URL if ads are not initially visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls through the Article Side-Nav Links
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a 300x250 Ad space under every 4 Articles in the listing

title: Team News - 728x90 Under Every Article
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded a team page
AND the user has removed everything from the url except the team and news
-EX: https://sny.tv/mets/news
AND the user has added ?adtest=flatads to the end of the URL if ads are not initially visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down through the Article in the right-hand column
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a 728x90 Ad space displayed underneath each Article's comment box and share buttons

custom_steps: WHEN there are no more results

Login with SNY.tv

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on a team archive news page
Ex: https://www.sny.tv/mets/archive/2016-12
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the Calendar or the date input field and engages the Datepicker overlay
AND the user clicks a specific date
Ex: May 2016
custom_expected:
Then the archives page will reload the content for the month selected
Ex: https://www.sny.tv/mets/archive/2016-05

title: Post Comments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User needs to be logged-in for posting a comment.
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Go to Hamburger Menu
2. Click on any team. Ex: Mets
3. Click on any Article' Read More and scroll to bottom of the article to see the Comments section.
4. Click on Comments, to open comments.
5. Type something with alphabetic + numeric + special characters on "Add a comment" box.
6. Use Bold, Italic format on words.
7. Add a GIF meme by clicking GIF icon below the message.

8. Click on Post button to submit comment.
custom_expected:
THEN

The comment should be visible with all criteria. 

The added GIF should also be visible on comment section.

title: Edit Comment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
The user can only edit his/her own posted comment.
custom_steps:
WHEN

Move user cursor to the top right corner of the comment. (a hidden dropdown menu should show up).
Click on "Edit" link to edit comment.

Edit the comment and click on Update to submit updated comment.
custom_expected: THEN The updated comment should be showing up on comment section.

title: Reply Comment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN:

User is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN:

1. Click on Reply link on the bottom-left corner of comment.

2. Type somthing with alphabetic + numeric + special characters on "Add a comment" box.
3. Use Bold, Italic format on words.
4. Add a GIF meme by clicking GIF icon below the message.

5. Click on Post button to submit comment.
custom_expected:
THEN:

The replied comment should be showing up below main comment.

Added GIF should also be showing up.

title: Delete Comment
custom_preconds: GIVEN User can only delete his/her own comment.
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. Click on Edit option again and find the Delete link.
2. Click on Delete link to delete the commentg.
3. A pop-up warning message should show up as: "Are you sure you want to delete this comment?" 
4. Click on Yes button.
custom_expected: THEN Users should be able to remove their comments from comment section.

title: Sort Comments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN:

User is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN:

On top-left of comment section, there is sorting option to Sort by Best, Newest, Older
1. Click on dropdown menu, select Best.
2. Click on dropdown menu, select Newest.
3. Click on dropdown menu, select Oldest.
custom_expected:
THEN:

User should be able to Sort comments by Best, Newest and Oldest.

title: Like/ Dislike Comments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User needs to be logged-in to like or dislike comments.
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Like a comment by clicking Like icon below comment.

2. Dislike a comment by clicking Dislike icon below comment.
custom_expected: THEN User should be able to Like or Dislike any comment.

title: Name Tags
custom_preconds:
GIVEN:

User is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN:

On the bottom of each article, there are tags related to players on each article.
Click on any Name Tag.
custom_expected:
THEN:

Clicking on any name tag, should take user to all articles related to that specific tag name.

title: Share Article
custom_preconds: GIVEN User need to be logged-in to share the article.
custom_steps:
WHEN

On bottom of comment section, there are options for Share the article.
1. Click on Facebook icon and share the article.
2. Click on Twitter icon and share the article.
3. Click on email icon to email the article to someone.
custom_expected: THEN User should be able to share the article on all available options.

title: Contacting the privacy administrator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User should be able to contact the privacy administrator.
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. Select a category from Category dropdown
2. Type first name on First Name field
3. Type last name on Last Name field
4. Select a date of birth by selecting from Month (-mm), Day (-dd) and Year (-yyyy) dropdown menus.
5. Type email on Email field
6. Type city on City field
7. Select a state from State dropdown
8. Type zipcode on Zip field
9. Type a message using alphabetic, numeric and special characters.
10. Click on both Terms and Privacy policy links on bottom, to make sure they are working.
11. Go back to Contact-us page
12. Click on Submit button
custom_expected:
THEN
User should be able to submit the message.

title: Checking TV Schedule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
User should be able to check TV Schedules of sports.
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. Go to Home page Hamburger Menu> SNY> TV Schedule

2. Click on Calender dropdown box on top left.
3. On schedule page, click on Calender dropdown box.
4. Select current date or a future date.
5. Observe the results

Sort results by clicking on "Schedules by Sport" dropdown menu. Click on each sorting contents below:

- Mets TV schedule
- Winter Sports
- SNY Programming
- UConn Programming
- Jets Programming
- SNY Programming
- College Football
custom_expected:
THEN
- Results should be showing programs on those specific date selected by Calendar
- Observe the sorting results. Sorting by each selected sports should show results only related to that sport.

User is at the  Mets schedule page (Menu> Mets schedule)

Clicking on "Schedules by Sport" dropdown menu from top left and select 'Mets TV schedule'
custom_expected:
THEN:

Mets TV schedule is listed in ascending order
